trends: There have been 12 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around September 21st 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI looked up towards the NYC skyline and saw a stationary light. Commented to another person -- he thought it was a star, NOT! After about 15 minutes, it started to move North slowly and then, very quickly, it flew into the western sky over NJ and out of my range of vision. One or two nights ago, I saw a hovering light close to the NYC skyline. It was not a helicopter as I see many of them. I am very curious as to what it is. Spy satellite? GPS drone? I hope you have an answer!
